objarg.name: devioce
objarg.description:
the name of the device as given in the system settings.
default is "BlackHole 64ch"

attribute.name: auto_start
attribute.description:
automatically start the device
default is true

attribute.name: input_enabled
attribute.description:
enable the input
default is true

method.name: bang
method.description:
In left input: enable device manually.
In right input: choose the device as set in the system settings. MAC OS ONLY
